description: Try our easy to follow Prawns With Sesame Noodles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Prawns With Sesame Noodles Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs sesame oil, save 1 tbs to serve
1 yellow capsicum, cored, deseeded and sliced
1 red capsicum, cored, deseeded and sliced
1 large carrot, peeled and cut into thin sticks

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the noodles in a large saucepan of unsalted water for 4 minutes or according to the instructions on the packet.

Meanwhile, heat a large wok over a high heat until smoking. Add the oils and stir-fry the capsicums for 1-2 minutes. Add the mushrooms, cook for 1 minute, then add the carrot and cook for a further minute. Add the spring onions, chilli and prawns and stir-fry for 2 minutes.
Drain the noodles and add them to the wok. Mix to combine, heat through, then scatter with the sesame seeds and serve immediately.
